pinsirite.desc: If holder is a Pinsir, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.
pinsirite.name: Pinsirite

pixieplate.desc: Holder's Fairy-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Fairy type.
pixieplate.name: Pixie Plate

poisongem.desc: Holder's first successful Poison-type attack will have 1.3x power. Single use.
poisongem.name: Poison Gem

poisoniumz.desc: If holder has a Poison move, this item allows it to use a Poison Z-Move.

pokeball.desc: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It is designed as a capsule system.

pomegberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.
pomegberry.name: Pomeg Berry

powerherb.desc: Holder's two-turn moves complete in one turn (except Sky Drop). Single use.

primariumz.desc: If holder is a Primarina with Sparkling Aria, it can use Oceanic Operetta.

protectivepads.desc: Holder's attacks do not make contact with the target.

przcureberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.

psychicgem.desc: Holder's first successful Psychic-type attack will have 1.3x power. Single use.

qualotberry.name: Qualot Berry

quickclaw.desc: Each turn, holder has a 20% chance to move first in its priority bracket.
quickclaw.name: Quick Claw

quickpowder.desc: If holder is a Ditto that hasn't Transformed, its Speed is doubled.

rabutaberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

razorclaw.desc: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

redorb.desc: If holder is a Groudon, this item triggers its Primal Reversion in battle.

repeatball.desc: A Poke Ball that works well on Pokemon species that were previously caught.

rindoberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Grass-type attack. Single use.

ringtarget.desc: The holder's type immunities granted solely by its typing are negated.
